author: Fextralife
description:
No Rest for the Wicked THE BREACH - Gameplay Update
Check out NRFTW’s biggest update yet - The Breach: https://rebrand.ly/35f198 
Sponsored by: Moon Studios

In this No Rest for the Wicked video, I will be talking about the latest major update for the game,  The Breach. In this latest update, in addition to adding new story content, the studio has reworked and revamped a lot of systems in the game. If you have not played No Rest for the Wicked for a while, or have not played the game yet, you have come to the right place since we will be covering all the changes and new systems in the game since the last update. 

Timestamp

2:55 - New Weapons Wands and Gauntlets

5:39 - Itemization Overhaul

6:52 - Masterwork Weapons
7:10 -
title: No Rest for the Wicked Gameplay Update - THE BREACH
